inlineContent.text: is to provide a programmatic way to work with the edgeEngine Runtime to access information about the mobile device on which the application is running, as well as mobile devices running within a cluster of mobile devices that are hosting the edgeEngine Runtime. Also, to allow developers to use edge microservices running within a particular cluster.

, developers can build applications compatible with the edgeEngine Runtime.

Additionally, this component provides utility APIs that help developers with core operations such as Authentication, edgeEngine Runtime Setup, deployment of edge microservices and handling of network calls.
